chapters.title: Chapter 22: Out of Thin Air
chapters.info: Raolin Darksbane, p. 433 (499)—False Dragon who declared himself from 335-336 years after the Breaking of the World. His armies beseiged Tar Valon in an attempt to rescue him, an attempt which met with extreme failure. He was born in Aren Mador, now called Far Madding. See also Dragon, The; Dragon Reborn.
